Given your interest in war films written by Saul Dibb, I'd highly recommend "Hart's War" (2002). It's a gripping tale set during World War II where a law student turns lieutenant and takes on the challenge of defending a black prisoner wrongfully accused of murder. The star-studded cast includes Bruce Willis and Colin Farrell.

If you fancy something a bit different but still written by Saul Dibb, "The End of the Affair" (1999) might appeal to you. This film is a captivating drama about a man searching for answers about his ex-lover's mysterious departure from their relationship. Notable stars include Ralph Fiennes and Julianne Moore. Enjoy your movie time!
